ValidationRule.description: Client load Complete Date has to be filled when Client Load Complete date is not null
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISBLANK( Date_Client_Load_Received__c ) && NOT( ISBLANK( Date_IS_Assigned__c ) ) && (NOT( BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ***** Please Fill-in the Client Load Received Date ****
